column1: Uchi////I'm not sure if my boyfriend regrets giving me the choice to pick the location of my birthday dinner
column2: or loves me even more for it.  I knew immediately that I wanted to try Uchi
column3: so when he asked me where I wanted to go
column4: I jumped at the chance to try it.  Looking back
column5: I probably should have warned him about the "$$$$" classification
